title: Why do i keep getting low priority queues?
body: I left like 2 games a day or two ago and now every time i wanna play I'm placed in this stupid queue, I can understand doing after the game but doing it for like every game is fucking dumb. How long do I have to keep getting placed in this queue?

replies.body: The first LPQ you get tends to be 5 games, which it looks like that's what happened in your case. Looks like you've already played through those and won't have to wait anymore!
After receiving a Leaverbuster, your next 5 games will place you in Low Priority Queue.
Im pretty sure i played more then 5 games, but that is good to know I thought it was only one game
